Sentence.sentence: Morgan said last week that he would retire at the end of January because of the governor's proposal to split off six universities of the Board of Regents system and create separate governing boards for each of them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Martin said officials were still working to analyze the data from the Board of Regents.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In an email sent Monday to college presidents in the Tennessee Board of Regents system, outgoing Chancellor John Morgan said an internal analysis showed that each campus' spending on facilities management fell well below the industry standards identified by the state.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He opposed the governor's plan to reconstruct the college board system.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The other half will have to wait, as authorities of America's Federal Aviation Administration ( ' , FAA) and National Transportation Safety Board work out what went wrong.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Given the high price of room and board and the closeness of the school to his family, he chose to live at home and worked between 30 and 40 hours a week while taking a full class schedule.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Across the board, American colleges and universities are not doing a very good job of preparing their students for the workplace or their post-graduation lives.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The publisher, fearful of being cheated, forced her to submit to his scholarly examination by a board of educated men, including the colonial governor.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The board of judges questioned Wheatley extensively and ruled that she was educated enough to have written the book
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As the databases grew, machine accuracy dipped across the board.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Nokia's board resisted change, making it impossible for the company to adapt to rapid shifts in the industry.

Sentence.sentence: NYU is consistently ranked one of the country's most expensive schools, with room and board costs totaling upwards of $64,000 a year.

Sentence.sentence: Ruel says there are encouraging signs that politicians and implementers are beginning to get on board.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The Department for Education's guidance says schools can charge only for board and lodging if the trip is part of the syllabus, and that students receiving government aid are exempt from these costs.

lj.lj_ly: my education just went by the board.

(informal)fully consider or assimilate a new idea or situation

entry.def: A board is a flat, thin, rectangular piece of wood or plastic which is used for a particular purpose.
entry.tran: （有特殊用途的）木板，塑料板，板材

entry.def: A board is a square piece of wood or stiff cardboard that you use for playing games such as chess.
entry.tran: （下棋等用的）木板，硬纸板，棋盘

example.ex: Dr Tinsley had five pieces on the board against Chinook's four.
example.tran: 廷斯利博士在棋盘上还有5枚棋子，对手钦诺克还有4枚。

entry.def: You can refer to a blackboard or a noticeboard as a board.

example.ex: He wrote a few more notes on the board.
example.tran: 他在黑板上又写了几条注释。

entry.def: Boards are long flat pieces of wood which are used, for example, to make floors or walls.
entry.tran: （用来铺地板、筑围墙等的）长条木板

example.ex: The floor was draughty bare boards.
example.tran: 地面铺的是透气性好的实木地板。

entry.def: The board of a company or organization is the group of people who control it and direct it.

example.ex: Arthur wants to put his recommendation before the board at a meeting tomorrow.
example.tran: 阿瑟希望在明天的会议上把自己的建议书提交董事会。

example.ex: ...the agenda for the September 12 board meeting.

entry.def: Board is used in the names of various organizations which are involved in dealing with a particular kind of activity.
entry.tran: （用于机构名称中）局，所，中心，委员会

example.ex: The Scottish Tourist Board said 33,000 Japanese visited Scotland last year.
example.tran: 苏格兰旅游局宣称去年有33,000名日本人到苏格兰旅游。
美国国家交通运输安全委员会

entry.def: When you board a train, ship, or aircraft, you get on it in order to travel somewhere.
entry.tran: 上，登上（火车、轮船或飞机）

example.ex: I boarded the plane bound for England.
example.tran: 我登上了飞往英格兰的飞机。

entry.def: Board is the food which is provided when you stay somewhere, for example in a hotel.

example.ex: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
example.tran: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

entry.def: An arrangement or deal that is above board is legal and is being carried out honestly and openly.
entry.tran: （协议或交易）合法诚信的，公开的，光明正大的

example.ex: All I knew about were Antony's own financial dealings, which were always above board.
example.tran: 据我所知，安东尼经手的金融交易一直是公开透明的。

entry.def: If a policy or a situation applies across the board, it affects everything or everyone in a particular group.

example.ex: There are hefty charges across the board for one-way rental...
example.tran: 各处对单程租赁的收费都很高。

example.ex: The President promised across-the-board tax cuts if re-elected.
example.tran: 总统许诺如果能再次当选将采取全面的减税措施。

entry.def: If something goes by the board, it is rejected or ignored, or is no longer possible.

example.ex: It's a case of not what you know but who you know in this world today and qualifications quite go by the board.
example.tran: 在当今这个世界，重要的不是你知道什么而是你认识谁，能力才干根本派不上用场。

entry.def: When you are on board a train, ship, or aircraft, you are on it or in it.

example.ex: They arrived at Gatwick airport on board a plane chartered by the Italian government...
example.tran: 他们乘坐意大利政府的包机到达盖特威克机场。

example.ex: ...a naval task force with two thousand marines on board.
example.tran: 由2,000名海军陆战队士兵组成的海军特遣队

entry.def: If someone sweeps the board in a competition or election, they win nearly everything that it is possible to win.
entry.tran: （在竞赛或选举中）取得压倒性胜利，大获全胜

example.ex: Spain swept the board in boys' team competitions.
example.tran: 西班牙队在男子团体比赛中大获全胜。

entry.def: If you take on board an idea or a problem, you begin to accept it or understand it.

example.ex: I hope that they will take on board some of what you have said.
example.tran: 我希望他们能采纳你们所提出的部分想法。

means.word_mean: 2. a flat piece of material designed for a special purpose;
3. a stout length of sawn timber; made in a wide variety of sizes and used for many purposes
4. a board on which information can be displayed to public view
5. a flat portable surface (usually rectangular) designed for board games;

sentences.sentence: "he got out the board and set up the pieces"

means.word_mean: 7. electrical device consisting of an insulated panel containing switches and dials and meters for controlling other electrical devices;

sentences.sentence: "suddenly the board lit up like a Christmas tree"

means.word_mean: 8. a printed circuit that can be inserted into expansion slots in a computer to increase the computer's capabilities
9. a table at which meals are served;

sentences.sentence: "he helped her clear the dining table"
"a feast was spread upon the board"

means.word_mean: 1. get on board of (trains, buses, ships, aircraft, etc.)
2. live and take one's meals at or in;

sentences.sentence: "she rooms in an old boarding house"
"The old lady is boarding three men"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bord, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch boord and German Bort; reinforced in Middle English  by Old French bort 'edge, ship's side' and Old Norse borth 'board, table'

sentences.cn: 科恩/费里猎头公司资深合伙人丹尼斯.凯里说:“在我所做的每一次招聘中，董事会都会让我首先从在任的CEO中寻找人选。”

sentences.cn: 2000年1月，露丝•西蒙斯以一名外部董事的身份加入高盛公司董事会; 时隔一年，她又担任了布朗大学的校长。
sentences.en: Ruth Simmons joined Goldman Sachs’s board as an outside director in January 2000: a year later she became president of Brown University.

sentences.cn: 2010 年2月，西蒙斯女土离开了董事会。
sentences.en: By February the next year Ms. Simmons had left the board.

sentences.cn: 外部董事被认为是公司董事会中有 :益却少有偏见的顾问。
sentences.en: Outside directors are supposed to serve as helpful, yet less biased, advisers on a firm’s board.

sentences.cn: 负责制定教育政策的校董事会在调査此事并举行公开听证会时指出,有关家庭作业的相关规定应当暂时搁置。
sentences.en: The homework rules should be put on hold while the school board, which is responsible for setting educational policy, looks into the matter and conducts public hearings.

sentences.cn: 诺基亚董事会反对改变，这也就使公司无法适应手机行业急剧的变化。
sentences.en: Nokia ’ s board  resisted change, making it impossible for the company to adapt to rapid shifts in the industry.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 田纳西州客户事务政府办公室正在审查外包政策的可行性，在其发出的一份电子邮件声明中， 发言人Michelle R.Martin 说各位官员仍在分析董事会提供的数据。
sentences.en: In an email statement from the state’s Office of Customer Focused Government, which is examining the possibility of outsourcing, spokeswoman Michelle R. Martin said officials were still working to analyze the data from the Board of Regents.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 上周，Morgan 曾说他将在一月底退休，因为州长建议将六所大学剥离出董事会系统，然后给这六所高校分别组建管理委员会。
sentences.en: Morgan said last week that he would retire at the end of January because of the governor’s proposal to split off six universities of the Board of Regents system and create separate governing boards for each of them.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 由于董事会对公司管理不善,公司负债累累.
sentences.en: The board has so misconducted the company that it's deep in debt.

sentences.cn: 罗斯科·海沃德和亚历克斯·范德沃特将向董事会致词.
sentences.en: Roscoe Heyward and Alex Vandervoort would address the board.

sentences.cn: 那个总裁的辞职是与董事会争权的结果.
sentences.en: The president's resignation was the result of a turf war with the board of directors.

sentences.cn: 我得冷静下来以对付整个董事会.
sentences.en: I shall have to gather myself together to face the whole board of directors.

sentences.cn: 明确股东大会 、 董事会 、 监事会的职责 、 任务.

sentences.cn: 这个协定必须经过董事会的正式批准.
sentences.en: The agreement has to be ratified by the board.

sentences.cn: 这个逻辑难题董事会游戏促进逻辑和程序上的思想, 和提高解决问题技艺.
sentences.en: This logic puzzle board game encourages and procedural thinking, and enhances problem solving skills.

sentences.cn: 恐怕不太知道, 只知道你参加董事会,做会议记录.
sentences.en: Not really, I'm afraid, except that you attend Board Meetings and take the minutes.

sentences.cn: 特易购董事会为受训者指派导师.
sentences.en: Participants are assigned a mentor from the Tesco board.

sentences.cn: 准则强调冲突的可能性,如果董事会成员成为贷款人, 莱德贝特先生说.
sentences.en: The guidelines stress the potential for conflicts if board members become lenders, Mr. Ledbetter said.

sentences.cn: 按照原先的交易条款,中铝公司将得到力拓两个董事会席位.
sentences.en: The original deal would have given Chinalco two board seats.

sentences.cn: 安达高公司董事会早前已通过了以上任命.
sentences.en: The appointments were approved by Alticor's Board of Directors earlier this week.

sentences.cn: 风险管理机构和董事会委员们是如何允许他们犯如此严重的错误哪?
sentences.en: How did the apparatus of risk managers and board committees allow them to err so badly?

sentences.cn: 新建议得到董事会的认可.
sentences.en: The new proposals have won the approval of the board.

sentences.cn: 还有什么更好的办法能逃避不买账的董事会和令人烦心的债务问题 呢 ?
sentences.en: How better to escape an unappreciative board and ungrateful debt?

sentences.cn: 董事会的特征主要包括董事会的规模, 董事会的构成, 董事会会议的频率和董事会的领导结构等.
sentences.en: The features of board include size, board constitution, frequency board meeting and board leading structure.

sentences.cn: 奥古斯都向彼得斯谈到躲在甲板上的皮姆.
sentences.en: Augustus tells Peters of Pym's presence on board.

sentences.cn: 请在甲板上做保护试验.
sentences.en: Please carry out the protection tests board.

sentences.cn: 咱们把它打捞上船,在甲板下面把它打开.
sentences.en: We brought it on board and opened it under the deck.

sentences.cn: 字面上我们可以看它的意思是大海上的腿,其实也就是不晕船的意思, 指一种在甲板上稳稳行走的能力.
sentences.en: The ability to walk on board ship with steadiness , especially in rough seas.

sentences.cn: 在暴风雨中, 甲板上的一些设备掉到海里去了.
sentences.en: During the storm, some of the equipment on deck fell by the board.

sentences.cn: 如:船的结构一般有船甲板 、 船的上层建筑等.

sentences.cn: 液货船上留有足够人员作有效之甲板当值,液货船及装卸液货站均有适当监督?
sentences.en: Is there an effective deck board and adequate supervision on the terminal and on the ships?

sentences.cn: 他的亚麻布制的袜子落到了甲板的水上,收缩了.
sentences.en: His linen sock fell over board in the water and shrank.

sentences.cn: 用没用的木板在甲板上做了个临时的舵,给它配备很困难.
sentences.en: A temporary rudder was made on board from spare planks and it was great difficulty.

sentences.cn: 我们上了船，看见这些人在甲板上肩挨着肩挤在一起。
sentences.en: We went on board and saw these people packed shoulder to shoulder on the decks.

sentences.cn: 你可以供我膳食和住宿 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you board and lodge me?

sentences.cn: 他工作辛苦, 但所得报酬只是供膳食而已.
sentences.en: He works hard, but gets only board wages.

sentences.cn: 敏妮想的却是嘉莉在他们家搭伙,可以增加些家里的收入.

sentences.en: Jim prefers to board with Mrs. Smith.
